sliderItems.name: Chocolate Mousse
sliderItems.description: A smooth and velvety chocolate mousse made from premium cocoa, delicately sweetened and topped with freshly whipped cream for a decadent finish.

sliderItems.name: Fresh Fruit Plate
sliderItems.description: A vibrant assortment of hand-picked, seasonal fruits bursting with natural sweetness and vitamins. Perfect as a light dessert or a refreshing snack.

sliderItems.name: Grilled Chicken
sliderItems.description: Succulent, herb-marinated chicken breast grilled to perfection, delivering a tender bite infused with aromatic spices. Ideal for a high-protein, flavorful meal.

sliderItems.name: Margherita Pizza
sliderItems.description: A timeless Italian favorite featuring a crisp, thin crust topped with tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves.
